publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4959 Nora Radcliffe: Grampian Police Force—That the Parliament congratulates Grampian Police for the high level of praise afforded it by HM Inspectorate of Constabulary; notes the commendation in the inspectorate’s report of its good working practice with local authorities and community groups in areas such as addressing alcohol-related violence, and asks the Scottish Executive to examine the recommendation of using this area of good practice as a template for all police boards and local authorities when dealing with alcohol-related disorders.
S2M-4959 Grampian Police Force (lodged on 16 October 2006) Donald Gorrie*
